Haunted Past

A supernatural encounter you experienced in your childhood has left you scarred. Your body and mind have been permanently altered, though whether these changes are a blessing or a curse is anyone's guess. Most will treat you with cordiality, either out of sympathy for your perceived trauma or fear of provoking your otherworldly ire.

Ability Score Increase. One ability score of your choice increases by 1.

Heart of Darkness. You have resistance to necrotic damage. @Compendium[5e-stat-decoupled.abilities.1MFGXYXX5634CIV9]{Heart of Darkness}

Skills. Choose one from: Arcana, Intimidation, Investigation, Religion.

Languages. Common, plus one exotic language of your choice.
